page.title: 10PELDON EARTHQUAKE.
page.content: On May 18th 1884 at 2pm there was an{Earthquake}centred on{Peldon. It was tragic. Everyone was frightened.The Earthquake badly affected the{Peldon Rose.}The roof tiles fell off and smashed on the ground.Doors fell off hinges,and windows cracked.The Earthquake spread to lots of towns including Colchester and Mersea Island.Also churches were damaged and the bells rang.Churches shuddered.Luckily no-one was killed. Last year the school held an Exhibition which included pictures of local places,as well as writing and drama. Also last year,there was a party to celebrate one hundred years since the Earthquake in Peldon.
